thread.title: China's August scare is a false alarm as fiscal crunch fades
thread.title_full: China's August scare is a false alarm as fiscal crunch fades

author: Ambrose Evans-Pritchard
title: China's August scare is a false alarm as fiscal crunch fades
text: Ambrose Evans-Pritchard China's August scare is a false alarm as fiscal crunch fades The recession in China has been and gone. The housing market is picking up as stimulus revives, putting off the day reckoning again The economy is already coming back to life after hitting a brick wall over the winter
